name: Red Citrus Rush
preparation: In a shaker filled with ice, combine the vodka, Redbull, lemon juice, and simple syrup. Shake well for about 15-20 seconds. Strain the mixture into a chilled highball glass filled with ice.
backstory: Designed for those who want a sweet kick with an energetic buzz. This cocktail blends the classic sharpness of lemon with the sweetness of simple syrup, complemented by the kick of vodka and the invigorating effect of Redbull.
